name: Rhythm Platformer
description:
What you get:

A platformer where the beat of the music determines when the player jumps. Make your way through fast paced levels, and work your musical chops up in order to stand up to the challenge.  

Responsive controls, fluid movement, and beautiful art -- explore the difficult first levels of this flow-inducing adventure to the top of the world.

How to play:

Playable with either a gamepad or keyboard.

Game prototype made as a Game Design Bachelor's degree project by Ian Klaere and Martin Bremer. Work in progress.
